sourcesContent:
import football from './images/icons/football.webp' import voleyball from './images/icons/voleyball2.png' import teacher from './images/icons/teacher.png' import hat from './images/icons/hat.png' import voley_bun from './images/icons/voleyball_tur.png' import foot_bun from './images/icons/football_tur.jpg' export default function WhatWeDoBan() { function onclick(event) { const bunner = document.getElementById('bunner') const on_img = document.getElementById('on_img') console.log(event.target.dataset.index) switch (event.target.dataset.index) { case '0' : bunner.src = foot_bun on_img.textContent='Турнир по Футболу ВЦО' break case '1' : bunner.src = voley_bun on_img.textContent='Турнир по волейболу "All STARS ВЦО"' break case '2' : break } } function give_img(el) { return() } const attr = [{src:football, data_index:0 , alt:"football icon"},{src:voleyball, data_index:1, alt:"voleyball icon"}, {src:teacher, data_index:2,alt:"teacher icon"},{src:hat, data_index:3 ,alt:"hat icon"}] return(<>
{attr.map(el =>give_img(el))}

)}
